name: Boxys Journey Through The Room
description:
A small and funny *cough* game for the Indie Tales GameJam, Theme: One Room

Go through a bizarre adventure with Boxy, a super-detailed, high-profile, awesome character! Meet other unforgetable characters like: The bug or the scarecrow! Sounds like super much fun, doesn't it? Just press the start button above this description and your journey begins! Do it. Now, if you excuse me, I will now visit my bed.

Controls:
Mouse

Version 1.1 is being made right now and will be available as soon the GameJam is over!

This game is even more stupid than my last one. I will try to "shitpost" less for my upcoming projects. Also, I've had pretty poor time management on this one, so this release has not the same level of polish than Your Average Lift Experience. I still gave my very best, enjoy!
